mapper.insert: insert into attitude values (#{attdNo}, #{attdEmpNo}, '출근', '정상근무', to_char(SYSDATE, 'hh24:mi:ss'),null, to_char(SYSDATE, 'yy-mm-dd'))
mapper.update: update attitude set attd_content='퇴근', attd_etime=to_char(SYSDATE, 'hh24:mi:ss') where attd_emp_no=#{attdEmpNo}
mapper.select: select count(attd_no) attd_no_count from attitude where attd_emp_no=#{empNo} and attd_date like '%'||to_char(sysdate, 'yy-mm')||'%'

select attd_date, emp_depart, emp_grade, emp_name, attd_case, attd_content, attd_stime, attd_etime from attitude inner join employee on attitude.attd_emp_no=employee.emp_no where emp_end='0' order by attd_date desc

select attd_date, emp_depart, emp_grade, emp_name, attd_case, attd_content, attd_stime, attd_etime from attitude inner join employee on attitude.attd_emp_no=employee.emp_no
attd_content like '%'||#{attdContent}||'%'
